channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Double-Edged Sword: AI’s Janus Face In The Sweltering Climate Crisis
item.description: We can allow AI to become another driver of environmental destruction, or we can harness its power to heal our wounded planet. The technology exists. ...

item.title: Public Health Is Getting Precise – Let’s Make Sure It’s Fair
item.description: Equity-focused precision public health means expanding datasets to include context — where and who people live with, quality of life and community-def...

item.title: MIT Teaches Soft Robots Body Awareness Through AI And Vision
item.description: MIT’s CSAIL researchers developed a system that lets soft robots learn how their bodies move using only vision and AI with no sensors, models or manua...

item.title: ‘Jurassic World Rebirth’ HFR With TrueCut Motion Is Exclusive To China
item.description: If you are a fan of high frame rate you will be disappointed that only China is getting a TrueCut Motion version of Jurassic World Rebirth.

item.title: Deep Research And More From New AI Models
item.description: Based on the advice of Ethan Mollick on One Useful Thing, this foray into new deep research functionality shows how AI has evolved over the past year.

item.title: Not smart vs. stupid
